A faint light now glows from one headlight, indicating that Nightshift was =
somewhat coming around.  Yet it was hard to tell how conscious he was since=
 he was stuck in vehicle mode.  Transmission, brake, and wiper fluids leak =
from beneath his frame as well as antifreeze and washer fluid.  Oil and fue=
l too seem to trickle out from beneath him.  For all intensive purposes he =
was totaled.  Not one inch of his frame appeared undamaged.

" Ughh.  Can't=
 transform.  Can't feel anything.  Can't see anything either.  "

Perpetual=
ly on the move and constantly busy. 

On Sep 18, 2011, at 6:09 PM, Super Cy=
clonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> "Nightshift!"
> 
> A single voic=
e attempted to penatrate into the fog of unconsciousness.
> "Nightshift wak=
e up!" The voice spoke again, it was WOLFGANG's voice
> and he was standing=
 over NIGHTSHIFT as they were both on the shuttle
> that had brought them i=
nto the jungle in the first place.
> 
> The shuttle was jostling as if it w=
as in the air and flying in an
> erratic pattern, the windows outside the s=
huttle showing that they
> were indeed flying.
> 
> "Nightshift wake up!" T=
his time the voice was RAMULUS as he also stood
> on another side, a medica=
l kit in his hand, he was adminstering
> something to NIGTSHIFT.
> 
> (TAG)=

> 
> Preston
> 

--Apple-Mail-21-927081713

   <p>"Nightshift!"<br>
<br>
A single voice attempted to penatrate into the=
 fog of unconsciousness.<br>
"Nightshift wake up!" The voice spoke again, i=
t was WOLFGANG's voice<br>
and he was standing over NIGHTSHIFT as they were=
 both on the shuttle<br>
that had brought them into the jungle in the first=
 place.<br>
<br>
The shuttle was jostling as if it was in the air and flyin=
g in an<br>
erratic pattern, the windows outside the shuttle showing that t=
hey<br>
were indeed flying.<br>
<br>
"Nightshift wake up!" This time the vo=
ice was RAMULUS as he also stood<br>
on another side, a medical kit in his =
hand, he was adminstering<br>
something to NIGTSHIFT.<br>

r>
